blogPost.excerpt: Appect is a magical landing page builder for mobile app owners that converts store links into landing pages in a seconds. You can create unlimited landing pages by picking from our beautifully crafted themes, track visitors and downloads and collect feedback!
blogPost.body: Appect is a magical landing page builder for mobile app owners that converts store links into landing pages in a seconds. You can create unlimited landing pages by picking from our beautifully crafted themes, track visitors and downloads and collect feedback!
blogPost.title: Appect - Turn your store link into a cool landing page in seconds
blogPost.author: Anıl Kıral

localize.description: Appect是一个神奇的登陆页面生成器，为移动应用程序所有者，在几秒钟内将商店链接转换为登陆页面。您可以从我们精美的主题中选择创建无限的着陆页，跟踪访问者和下载，并收集反馈意见!
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内将您的商店链接变成一个很酷的登陆页面。

localize.description: Appect是一個神奇的登陸頁面生成器，爲移動應用程序所有者，在幾秒鐘內將商店鏈接轉換爲登陸頁面。您可以從我們精美的主題中選擇創建無限的着陸頁，跟蹤訪問者和下載，並收集反饋意見!
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內將您的商店鏈接變成一個很酷的登陸頁面。

previous.excerpt: BCPRO.APP is a free research-based online tool that uses genetic factors to analyze a person’s risk of developing a severe case of COVID–19. ⠀ We score your 23andMe, Ancestry, or MyHeritage raw data, and turn the insights into a report in less than 1 minute.
previous.title: BCPRO.APP - Kick COVID using your DNA data… before it kicks you

localize.description: BCPRO.APP是一款免费的研究型在线工具，它利用遗传因素分析一个人患COVID-19重症的风险。⠀我们对您的23andMe、Ancestry或MyHeritage原始数据进行打分，并在1分钟内将洞察力转化为报告。
localize.tagline: 用你的DNA数据踢掉COVID... 在它踢掉你之前。

localize.description: BCPRO.APP是一款免費的研究型在線工具，它利用遺傳因素分析一個人患COVID-19重症的風險。⠀我們對您的23andMe、Ancestry或MyHeritage原始數據進行打分，並在1分鐘內將洞察力轉化爲報告。
localize.tagline: 用你的DNA數據踢掉COVID... 在它踢掉你之前。

next.title: 30-Year Mortgage Rate in the US moves up to 3.09%, highest since last June and 44 bps above its all-time low of 2.65% in early January. https://t.co/0Pss5gO06z

localize.full_text: 美国30年期抵押贷款利率升至3.09%，为去年6月以来最高，比1月初的历史低点2.65%高出44个基点。https://t.co/0Pss5gO06z。
美國30年期抵押貸款利率升至3.09%，爲去年6月以來最高，比1月初的歷史低點2.65%高出44個基點。https://t.co/0Pss5gO06z。
